ROM.Changelog:
##### Android 8.0.1 - Miix4 Build 18.5.1
* The May One Security Patch * MxPlatform API version 4.3.0 * Streamlining of system applications, fixing system hang * Kernel upstreaming, updates, and optimizations * Performance tweaks and improvements * Sensor fixes for a number of variants * Fixes to font rendering and anti-aliasing
**Updates to the following applications:**
* ClockPackage - MX4.3_2018A * SamsungCalendar_MXP - MX4.3 * SamsungIME - v5_SYSTEMUID_SWIFTKEY_VO * Messaging - MX4.3_2018A * SamsungVideoPlayer - 2018A_MX4.3 * SecGallery - 2018A * SecMyFiles - 2018A_MX4.3 * SystemUI - 2018A_MX4.3
**If you download updates over a data connection or while roaming, additional data charges may apply. It is advised to keep your device fully charged during the update.**
